title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 649.14 - Category f project listing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 649.14 - Category f project listing

State Regulations
(a) Funds available for category F shall be distributed in the form of linked
deposits on a first come first served basis as completed applications are
received and approved by the corporation's board of directors. If a completed
application is received by the corporation which exceeds the amount remaining
in category F, the corporation may reject the application or fund the linked
deposit up to the amount remaining in category F. (b) The commissioner shall, from time to
time, update the IUP to include all approved category F linked loan
recipients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
649.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
